Question: You attempt to threaten or negotiate with them by bringing up the time machine in some way. Your boss tells the guard to put the rifle down for a moment. Hes interested in hearing you out, but he doesnt actually know that you do not have any power or control over the time machine. Now you have to come up with a lie: immediately!

1.text: Make yourself sound important or superior or suggest you have authority or control over the time machine

2.text: Use a physical object in your endeavor or say something threatening or say something that can suggest damaging the time machine
